Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
      • AI

  • public class AI
extends Player
    The A.I. Class represents the A.I. player The A.I. Player decides on their move using minimax with alpha beta pruning. The A.I. player can have multiple behaviors that decide it's difficulty. TODO Cleanup Debug Lines and General Code Cleanup.
    Version:
    4/6/2018
    Author:
    Scott J

      • AI

        public AI(Player.Side side,
          int difficulty,
          boolean debug)
        Constructor for the AI
        Parameters:
        side - side the AI is playing on
        difficulty - difficulty of the AI value of 1-3
        debug - true if you want to enable debug output.

    • Method Detail

      • makeMove

        public MoveResult makeMove(Board board,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Move> moveHistory)
        Have the A.I. make a move on the board. Also needs to take into account if the A.I. can make an additional move!
        Parameters:
        board - board to use
        moveHistory - moveHistory to keep track of. Should be given from the driver.
        Returns:
        MoveResult of the A.I.'s move

      • heuristic

        public int heuristic(Board board,
                     Player.Side side)
        Performs the heurstic function on a specified board. The side parameter is the side that will be considered as the Max player.
        Parameters:
        board - board to use
        side - side to use for Max
        Returns:
        heuristic score of the board as an int
